testCases.title: Verify user can navigate to Billing
testCases.expectedResult: Billing page should be displayed with header and action buttons

testCases.title: Verify Billing page elements are visible
steps: Verify New Invoice button is visible
Verify Record Payment button is visible
Verify Submit Claim button is visible
testCases.expectedResult: All Billing page elements should be visible

testCases.title: Verify user can create a new invoice
steps: Fill in all required invoice details
Verify invoice appears in the list
testCases.expectedResult: New invoice should be created successfully

testCases.title: Verify user can record a payment
testCases.expectedResult: Payment should be recorded successfully

testCases.title: Verify user can submit insurance claim
testCases.expectedResult: Insurance claim should be submitted successfully

testCases.title: Verify user can search for invoices
steps: Enter patient name or invoice number in search field
testCases.expectedResult: Search should return matching invoices

testCases.title: Verify user can filter invoices by status
steps: Select a status from status filter dropdown
Verify only invoices with selected status are displayed
testCases.expectedResult: Invoices should be filtered by selected status

testCases.title: Verify user can edit an invoice
steps: Click Edit button on an existing invoice
testCases.expectedResult: Invoice should be updated successfully

testCases.title: Verify user can delete an invoice
steps: Click Delete button on an invoice
Verify invoice is removed from the list
testCases.expectedResult: Invoice should be deleted successfully

testCases.title: Verify user can view invoice details
steps: Click View button on an invoice
Verify all invoice information is displayed
testCases.expectedResult: Invoice details should be displayed correctly

testCases.title: Verify user can create payment plan
testCases.expectedResult: Payment plan should be created successfully

testCases.title: Verify user can apply adjustment
testCases.expectedResult: Adjustment should be applied successfully

testCases.title: Verify user can process refund
testCases.expectedResult: Refund should be processed successfully

testCases.title: Verify user can print invoice
steps: Click Print button on an invoice
Verify print dialog or preview opens
testCases.expectedResult: Invoice should be printable

testCases.title: Verify user can void an invoice
steps: Click Void button on an invoice
Verify invoice status changes to Void/Cancelled
testCases.expectedResult: Invoice should be voided successfully

testCases.title: Verify validation for required fields
testCases.expectedResult: Validation errors should be displayed for required fields

testCases.title: Verify user can view payment history
steps: Verify list of all payments is displayed
testCases.expectedResult: Payment history should be displayed correctly

testCases.title: Verify user can view claims status
steps: Verify list of all claims is displayed
testCases.expectedResult: Claims status should be displayed correctly

testCases.title: Verify user can generate reports
testCases.expectedResult: Report should be generated successfully

testCases.title: Verify user can download report
testCases.expectedResult: Report should be downloaded successfully

testCases.title: Verify billing summary dashboard
steps: Verify Total Outstanding amount is displayed
Verify Total Paid amount is displayed
Verify Total Overdue amount is displayed
testCases.expectedResult: Billing summary should display correct amounts

testCases.title: Verify user can filter by payment method
steps: Verify only payments with selected method are displayed
testCases.expectedResult: Payments should be filtered by selected method

testCases.title: Verify user can refresh billing data
testCases.expectedResult: Billing data should be refreshed successfully

testCases.title: Verify user can clear search filters
testCases.expectedResult: Search filters should be cleared and all invoices displayed

testCases.title: Verify user can navigate between billing tabs
steps: Click on each tab (Invoices, Payments, Claims, etc.)
testCases.expectedResult: All billing tabs should be accessible and load correctly
